alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 9:19AM MST until December 04 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches at Lookout Pass and Lolo Pass and 1 to 2 inches in the valleys. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lolo Pass, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Evaro Hill, and Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region
